name: Carrier Trail
description:
The Kickstarter Page is Still Active!Be sure to check the page out! Let's hit those stretch goals!



Deliver a package to the royal family and live to tell the tale! Carrier Trail is an indie, adventure game developed by CrackedGhostGames and inspired by the 1985 game, Oregon Trail.INFINITE REPLAYABILITY Each time you play Carrier Trail will be a fresh new adventure! All the events in-game are randomly generated each time you play so that you never get the same game twice!THOUSANDS OF EXPERIENCESYou read that right, THOUSANDS OF EXPERIENCES! MADNESS! Each event has multiple endings, branches, and choices for you to make to add even MORE randomness and replayability to each run!BEAUTIFUL GAMEBOY INSPIRED PIXEL ARTA massive, hand-drawn overworld 8,176 pixels wide! Each pixel placed in a specific area to create a minimalistic yet beautiful overworld for you to admire as you go about your journey.FEATURES
  • Dungeon Delving
  • Massive Overworld
  • Choose-Your-Own-Adventure Styled Events
  • Hours of Gameplay
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Manage Supplies to Survive
  • Work Odd Jobs
  • Explorable Towns
  • Branching Events
